analyzed: gzhung bzhin rngo ma thogs pas/_bsnyen sgrub tshhad du ma phyin par las la sbyar ba
translated: I have not been able to practice in accordance with the texts, and I have applied myself to the activities without completing the approach and accomplishment.

original: dang /_tshhogs dang phud gtor dus su ma grub pa dang /_mchod pa'i 'byor🔽tshhogs chungs pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin ma gsal bar bzlas pa gra chag pa dang / phyi nang gsang ba'i rten rdzas ma tshhogs par gsang ba bsgrags pa dang /_sku
analyzed: dang /_tshhogs dang phud gtor dus su ma grub pa dang /_mchod pa'i 'byor tshhogs chungs pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin ma gsal bar bzlas pa gra chag pa dang / phyi nang gsang ba'i rten rdzas ma tshhogs par gsang ba bsgrags pa dang /_sku
translated: I have not accomplished the offerings and the torma at the appropriate times, and my offerings have been🔽poor.🔽I have not been clear in my samadhi, and I have broken the recitation. I have revealed the secret without having the outer, inner, and secret substances.

original: gsung thugs dang phyi nang gsang ba'i dam tshhig nyams pa thams cad mthol lo
analyzed: gsung thugs dang phyi nang gsang ba'i dam tshhig nyams pa thams cad mthol lo
translated: I have broken all the outer, inner, and secret samaya of body, speech, and mind. I confess all these faults.

original: bshags so/_/dpal nag po chen po ye shes kyi spyan dang ldan pa/_khrag 'thung gi
analyzed: bshags so/_/dpal nag po chen po ye shes kyi spyan dang ldan pa/_khrag 'thung gi
translated: Glorious Mahakalarupa, you who possess the eyes of wisdom, king of blood drinkers,

original: rgyal po/_bstan pa'i bka' bsrungs/_dam nyams kyi srog gcod/_rig 'dzin gyi
analyzed: rgyal po/_bstan pa'i bka' bsrungs/_dam nyams kyi srog gcod/_rig 'dzin gyi
translated: guardian of the teachings, life taker of those who break samaya,🔽life tree of the vidyadharas, enemy deity of the yogis, doctor of the three poisons,

original: srog shing /_rnal 'byor gyi dgra lha/_dug gsum gyi sman pa/_gtshug lag khang
analyzed: srog shing /_rnal 'byor gyi dgra lha/_dug gsum gyi sman pa/_gtshug lag khang
translated: pillar of the temple,

original: gi bsrungs ma/_bdag gi rnal 'byor bsrungs shig_/tshhe dang dbang phyug spel
analyzed: gi bsrungs ma/_bdag gi rnal 'byor bsrungs shig_/tshhe dang dbang phyug spel
translated: Protect my yogic practice, increase my life and power,

original: cig_/dpal dang grags pa bsgrubs shig_/'khor dang gang zag skyongs shig_/🔽sdang ba'i dgra dang bar chad kyi rkyen rnams thul cig_/bgegs rigs stong phrag
analyzed: cig_/dpal dang grags pa bsgrubs shig_/'khor dang gang zag skyongs shig_/ sdang ba'i dgra dang bar chad kyi rkyen rnams thul cig_/bgegs rigs stong phrag
translated: attain glory and fame, and protect my retinue and followers.🔽Subdue all hostile enemies and adverse conditions,🔽and avert the eighty-four thousand types of obstructing forces.

original: brgyad cu bzlog cig_/nad rigs bzhi brgya rtsha bzhi zhi bar mdzod cig_/
analyzed: brgyad cu bzlog cig_/nad rigs bzhi brgya rtsha bzhi zhi bar mdzod cig_/
translated: Pacify the four hundred and four types of illnesses.

original: ltas ngan brgyad cu rtsha bzhi bsgyur cig_/ye 'brog sum brgya drug cu bzlog cig/
analyzed: ltas ngan brgyad cu rtsha bzhi bsgyur cig_/ye 'brog sum brgya drug cu bzlog cig/
translated: Transform the eighty-four types of bad omens, and avert the three hundred and sixty types of misfortune.

original: lo'i keg dang zla ba'i keg dang zhag gi keg dang za ma'i keg dang bkra mi shis pa
analyzed: lo'i keg dang zla ba'i keg dang zhag gi keg dang za ma'i keg dang bkra mi shis pa
translated: Avert all obstacles of the year, month, day, and mealtime, and all inauspiciousness.

original: thams cad bzlog cig_/ces brjod par bya'o/_/yi ge brgya pa ci nus bzlas🔽par bya'o/_/rnal 'byor pa rnams tshhogs la longs spyod par bya'o/_/de nas smad
analyzed: thams cad bzlog cig_/ces brjod par bya'o/_/yi ge brgya pa ci nus bzlas par bya'o/_/rnal 'byor pa rnams tshhogs la longs spyod par bya'o/_/de nas smad
translated: Recite the hundred-syllable mantra as much as possible,🔽and yogis should enjoy the feast offerings.🔽Then, perform the fierce activity of the lower rite.

original: las kyi drag po'i las sbyor yang bya'o/_/dpal mgon po bya rog ma'i bskangs kyi cho
analyzed: las kyi drag po'i las sbyor yang bya'o/_/dpal mgon po bya rog ma'i bskangs kyi cho
translated: The Homage to the Glorious Protector Crow-Faced Goddess

original: ga'i rim pa/_bla ma a b+ha ya ka ras/_dpal na len+d+ra'i gtshug lag khang du/_rdo sku
analyzed: ga'i rim pa/_bla ma a b+ha ya ka ras/_dpal na len+d+ra'i gtshug lag khang du/_rdo sku
translated: The guru Abhayākara

original: rang byung gi rtshar mdzad pa'o/
analyzed: rang byung gi rtshar mdzad pa'o/
translated: made the self-arisen image of the stone🔽in the temple of glorious Nālandā.

original: phyis bla ma chen po dpal rga los rang 'gyur mdzad pa'o//_//
analyzed: phyis bla ma chen po dpal rga los rang 'gyur mdzad pa'o//_//
translated: Later, the great guru Śrī Ghaṇṭāpāda made his own translation.

original: dpal mgon po bya rog ma'i bskangs kyi cho ga'i rim pa
analyzed: dpal mgon po bya rog ma'i bskangs kyi cho ga'i rim pa
translated: The Stages of the Ritual of the Glorious Protector Kākāsyā
